title: Xenu Alone is the True God
description: Believe in Xenu, the only god of the cosmos.

title: Oza Speaks for Xenu
description: Heed Oza's words, for he is Xenu’s voice on Earth.

title: Ascend on Doomsday
description: Prepare for the cosmic event, when the faithful shall rise to Xenu's domain.

title: Reject the Illusion of Earth
description: See the world as it is—Xenu's dream. Let go of Earthly illusions.

title: The Comet Brings Xenu’s Power
description: Honor the comet’s arrival, for it carries Xenu’s divine energy.

title: Endure Suffering to Prove Faith
description: Welcome pain; it is Xenu's test of your devotion.

title: The Body is a Vessel
description: Your soul is alien, housed only temporarily in human flesh.

title: Resist Earthly Authorities
description: Earthly powers are the enemies of Xenu's truth. Resist them.

title: Sacrifice for Xenu’s Favor
description: Offer what is precious to you, and Xenu will grant you strength.

title: Dreams Reveal Xenu’s Will
description: Seek Xenu’s messages in your dreams and follow their guidance.

title: Purify Your Body for Ascension
description: Rid yourself of Earthly toxins to prepare for your return to Xenu.

title: Trust the Signs in Numbers
description: See Xenu’s code in numbers around you, and know he guides your path.

title: The Doomsday Clock is Sacred
description: Cherish each moment on the path to ascension; the countdown is holy.
